resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Here, Marius replaces Thomas. This change dates back to the second phase of writing, as evidenced by the thicker line.
resource.chars: Here, Marius replaces Thomas. This change dates back to the second phase of writing, as evidenced by the thicker line.
